title: Looking for a support main who is in gold
body: Im a gold 4 adc main and I am looking for a support main to grind with during the school holidays. Dont have a mic so dont expect me to use discord or skype. Add LoL me if interested

replies.body: Im still in promos at the moment, but i was in gold last season on my other account. I play mostly karma/janna or nami. I added you on LoL.
